snippet: The cases are being watched closely because the transmission occurred in a shared hospital room.
abstract: France confirms second case of a new coronavirus belonging to the same family as SARS, saying man who shared a hospital room with the first victim had been infected; case is being watched closely by World Health Organization.

byline.contributor: Lawrence K. Altman contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The cases are being watched closely because the transmission occurred in a shared hospital room.

headline.seo: France Confirms Second Case of Virus Linked to SARS
headline.main: France Confirms Second Case of Virus Linked to SARS
headline.print_headline: France Confirms 2nd Case Of Virus Linked to SARS
